title: HAP 12 - From Here to Timbuktu - Subsaharan Islamic Philosophy
itunes:title: HAP 12 - From Here to Timbuktu - Subsaharan Islamic Philosophy
description: The spread of Islamic scholarship in subsaharan Africa, focusing on intellectuals of the Songhay empire around the Niger River in the 15th-17th centuries.
content:encoded: The spread of Islamic scholarship in subsaharan Africa, focusing on intellectuals of the Songhay empire around the Niger River in the 15th-17th centuries.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
